creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
inscription: URQ: 南山竹芒圖 / 壬午夏日寫□奉壽 / 宣仙上人八十初度 / 嬝々欽袵 (Picture of bamboo on a southern mountain. Painted on a summer day in 1822 to celebrate the eightieth birthday of a holy man. With lingering respect.)
markings: URQ: 隣風{Rinfū}; 江馬 {Ema}; 多保 {Tahō}; 淇澳君子 {Kiō Kunshi}
title: Southern Mountain Bamboo
